title: Public transport for the 2025 AFL Season
articleContent:
AFL returns to Melbourne in 2025! Public transport is your best way to enjoy it.

We're running extra services to and from these games to get you there and home again.

Geelong Cats v Brisbane Lions

Friday 5 September, 7.40pm at the MCG

Before you travel

Please check the Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Please visit the AFL, and MCG websites for further match information and updates.

Plan your journey below to search for regular and additional services running to and from the game:
